meanings.sent1: She is the footiest player on the team.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the players, she is the footiest.
meanings.sent3: Her footiest moves always impress the coach.
meanings.sent4: Her skills are the footiest on the field.
meanings.sent5: Her footiest performance left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: He is the footiest player in the league.

meanings.sent4: His speed is the footiest on the field.
